description: This spicy salad has the intense smoky flavour of chorizo.
keywords: Potato salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Sriracha & Chorizo Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pot of hot water to the boil with the salt and boil the potatoes for 10 minutes.
In a non stick pan on a medium heat, fry the chorizo for 5 minutes. Add the onion to the pan and fry for a further 2 minutes.
Drain the water from the potatoes and then add the potatoes to the pan and fry for a further 5 minutes.
Remove from the heat, season, drizzle with sriracha and garnish with chives.
